caption:
This photograph captures an older woman playing croquet on a grassy field. The woman is wearing a red short-sleeved shirt, red shorts, white socks, and red shoes, accentuated with a large white sun hat and sunglasses. She is bending forward, focusing intently on hitting a white croquet ball with a mallet, which has a colorful striped handle.

The setting includes a sunny day with shadows indicating bright sunlight. The background is blurred but shows lush green trees and a trimmed grass lawn, suggesting that the setting may be a park or a backyard specifically arranged for playing croquet. The scene conveys a leisurely, outdoor summer activity, characterized by casual sporty attire and a serene, green environment.
title: On the croquet court at century village retirement community
